text.tspan: A professional-quality suite of free and open source creative applications.
I hope to establish a professional-quality suite of creative applications for
GNU/Linux, Windows, and macOS, but I can't without your help.
This software will always be free, but living is (unfortunately) not.
As it is, I'm writing this software when I'm able to work on it, but that's not a lot of time.
It's mostly a weekend project, but I have huge ambitions - I truly believe that we can
make something to rival the industry standard. That's where you come in.
There are three ways that you can help. If you can program in C++, I'd love contributions.
If you have a little bit of spare change, then that would go toward the software as well. Otherwise,
if you can't do either of those, just spread the word.
Rome wasn't built in a day, but I hope to have a public alpha of the designer done
by the end of this year.
Thanks for checking this software out. Hopefully, when it's done, it can benefit the design community
